item.title: How Is Tallow Balm Made? A Look at Ingredients & Process
item.description: How Is Tallow Balm Made? Tallow balm is a simple but effective moisturizer made from beef tallow, blended with nourishing oils. However, not all tallow balm NZ products are made the same way—quality depends on the ingredients and process used. What Is Tallow Balm Made Of? A good tallow balm contains only a few key ingredients: Beef tallow (from suet, not dripping) Olive oil – Softens the balm and boosts hydration.
